title: Bug 24482[Welcome] Change WelcomeItem to use displayHelpResource instead of deprecated displayHelp
description: Bug 24482[Welcome] Change WelcomeItem to use displayHelpResource instead of deprecated displayHelp build 20021001org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.WelcomeItem is using the deprecated methoddisplayHelp. Changing this uncovereda problem with JDT welcome page help URLs.Opened bug 24481 to get the JDT URLs fixed. Fixing this bug anyway since thehelp links are already broken.
